p: Although neutralizing antibody test was indicated as one of the criteria for donor selection, this test was not conducted due to an unavailability in our country. In order to perform neutralizing antibody test after achieving the capacity, blood sample was stored from each plasma donor for the further investigation since it is considered to be critically important in demonstrating the effectiveness of transfused convalescent plasma. With the onset of the outbreak, although plasma inactivation is not routinely performed in our country, pathogen inactivation system is established at Regional Blood Centers in Istanbul and Ankara for CCP, where the outbreak was more intensive.
